title: CRUD Operations
description: Build a user management system using GORM that demonstrates fundamental database operations including creating, reading, updating, and deleting users.
short_description: Learn basic GORM CRUD operations and build a user management system
learning_objectives: Understand GORM basics and database connection
Implement Create, Read, Update, Delete operations
Work with GORM models and structs
Manage database transactions and error handling
real_world_connection: User management systems are foundational to most applications, from authentication systems to content management platforms.
requirements: Retrieve users by ID and get all users
